Show:

Gamepad Class

Defined in: plugins/gamepad-plugin-1.0.0.js:1
Module: Gamepad
Parent Module: Kiwi.Plugins

The Gamepad plugin brings the features of Gamepad.js to Kiwi.js. For more information look here: https://dvcs.w3.org/hg/gamepad/raw-file/default/gamepad.html
